feed.title: RSS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.5.0
entry.content:
• Updated framework from Laravel 10 to 11
  • Updated PHP version to PHP 8.3

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.5.2
entry.content:
• Updated PHP & JS dependencies (technically part of 1.5.1) .
  • Updated repo, workflows, and docker image to be Codeberg hosted.

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.5.3
entry.content:
• Updated PHP & JS dependencies
  • Fixed issue where some feeds would not be parsed due to basic content checks (#30)

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.6.0
entry.content:
• Updated to latest versions of core dependencies (Laravel 12, IntertiaJS 2, Vite 6, tailwind 4)
  • Removed redundant dependencies (PostCSS, Autoprefixer, Axios)
  • Updated base, build & CI docker images
  • Fixed some issues with failing tests

Changes made via PR #31

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.6.1
entry.content:
• Added some level of RSS 1.0 support (#32)
  • Updated PHP dependencies
